jodd.util

Class DateFormatSymbolsEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.util.DateFormatSymbolsEx

  • public class DateFormatSymbolsEx
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple holder for DateFormatSymbols that doesn't create new array on each call. This improves performance by avoiding duplication of returned arrays.

    Use this class from LocaleUtil or cache it manually, as only one instance per locale is enough.
